import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios'; function UserUpdate() { let {id}=useParams() let[name,setname]=useState() let[age,setage]=useState() let[city,setcity]=useState() let[email,setemail]=useState() useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:3000/User/" + id).then((res)=>{ setname(res.data.name) setage(res.data.age) setcity(res.data.city) setemail(res.data.email) }) },[id]) return ( <>

Update User

) } export default UserUpdate
